long_description: With a lightweight carbon frame and high-end Shimano Ultegra components, the 22-speed Diamondback Century 5 road bike combines high performance and comfortable geometry. Carbon frame offers excellent handling, delivering a lightweight, strong and responsive platform for maximum efficiency without the uncomfortable geometry of full race bikes. Full-carbon fork with tapered carbon steerer uses continuous fibers to maximize strength, stiffness and handling response, all with little weight penalty. With an intuitive design and light weight, Shimano Ultegra derailleurs and shifters offer very precise, dependable shifts throughout the 22 gear combinations. FSA Team Issue Compact crankset with 50/34 chainrings is paired with a 11-30 cassette for a wide range of gearing for easy climbs and speed on the flats. Shimano RS-21 wheels are equipped with Michelin 4 Pro Endurance tires to supply good all-around performance. Please note that this bike includes composite test pedals; additional pedals sold separately. Specs on the Diamondback Century 5 Bike are subject to change.
short_description: With a lightweight carbon frame and high-end Shimano Ultegra components, the 22-speed Diamondback Century 5 road bike combines high performance and comfortable geometry.
